tasks.task: Operate a chalkboard to write instructions for planting corn.
subtasks: Approach the chalkboard.
Position body to reach the chalkboard.
Twist torso to write on the left side of the chalkboard.
Grasp chalk with hand.
Move arm to write "Plant corn 18 inches apart" vertically.
Erase previous writing if necessary.
Write new instruction: "Plant corn 18 inches apart".

tasks.task: Use a corn planter to plant corn seed.
subtasks: Approach the corn planting field.
Step into the planter to operate it.
Adjust the planter'sDepthControl to 18 inches.
Ensure seed box is filled with corn seeds.
Engage the planter's motor.
Guide the planter along rows, ensuring 18-inch spacing.
Step off the planter after completing the pass.

tasks.task: Address a manager regarding planting plans.
subtasks: Approach the manager's office.
Knock on the door or announce presence.
Enter the office and greet the manager.
Sit down at a desk or chair.
Present a planting plan, perhaps on a clipboard.
Discuss planting techniques and schedule.
Note any feedback or instructions from the manager.
Take notes if needed.
Exit the office and return to planting duties.
